participant_1.background:
I'm not even thinking about the weather.
My parents are very supportive of my art, even though they don't understand it.
summer is my favorite season.
i love to knit and crochet.
my favorite book is anne of green gables.

participant_2.background:
I am a woman who worries about the judgment of my family because of my sexual orientation.
I'm prone to tripping over my own two feet and dropping things.
I was a hockey player in my youth, but now I enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.
It's a bit chilly, but I'm looking forward to taking my dog hiking later.
I'd be scared to tell my family, but I think they'd be accepting.

content.text: Hello there!  It's a beautiful day outside, isn't it?
Hey!  It is a little chilly, but I'm not complaining.
I'm not really thinking about the weather.  I'm just excited to get started on my knitting project.
What are you knitting?  I love to knit and crochet, but I don't have a lot of time for it these days.
I'm knitting a baby blanket for my friend's new baby.  It's going to be a beautiful summer baby blanket.
That's so sweet of you!  I'm sure your friend will love it.
Thanks!  I'm pretty excited about it too.  I love to knit and crochet, and it's always so rewarding to finish a project.
I agree!  It's a great feeling to finish a project and see it come to life.
It really is.  I'm glad I have the time to do this today.  I don't always get to knit as much as I want to.
I know what you mean.  Life gets in the way sometimes.
But it's always nice to have a relaxing day to knit.
I agree!  It's a great way to de-stress and relax.
It really is.  I'm glad I can do this for my friend.
It's a beautiful day outside, but I'm looking forward to taking my dog hiking later.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day!  I'm sure your dog will love it.
I know he will!  He loves to hike.
I'm glad you have a great way to spend your day.  I'm going to enjoy my knitting.
Have fun!  I'm sure your friend will love the blanket.
Thanks!  I'm sure she will too.
